data.title: Phone, TV Service & Computer Discounts
data.text:
Phone & TV Service Discounts

AT&T

State of Indiana employees can join the AT&T Signature Program. As a member of the exclusive AT&T Signature Program, you'll receive:

Save $10/mo. per phone line when you get AT&T Unlimited Elite

Waived activation fees with select activations

Waived upgrade fees with select upgrades

LEARN MORE: www.att.com/wireless/stateofindiana

Cricket Wireless (Madison location)

State of Indiana employees can get up to four lines of data for $100 per month -- and other perks -- via Cricket Wireless.

This offer is exclusive to the Madison, Indiana location.

CLICK HERE to learn more.

T-Mobile

State Employee Offer: T-Mobile Work Perks

Save on Go5G plans and get UNLIMITED Talk, Text, and Data! Plans includes features like Netflix, mobile hotspot data, international texting and data, and free stuff every week with T-Mobile Tuesdays - all with taxes and fees included.

View the Work Perks flyer

View the Verify Go5G flyer

Who to contact: (Be sure to mention Promo Code – PERKSIN1)

New Accounts:

Call (855) 570-9947

Visit a local T-Mobile store: www.t-mobile.com/store-locator

Existing Customers – for Work Perks eligibility questions/options:

Call (877) 334-7099

Visit: www.t-mobile.com/perks – for online chat, FAQs and additional Perks information & promotions.

Promotion requires verification by work email or recent paystub.

Questions? allison.a.harnden@t-mobile.com or your dedicated Perks Team 855-570-9947.

View all current T-Mobile offers: https://www.t-mobile.com/offers.

Computer Discounts

HP

HP has teamed up with the State of Indiana to offer you the opportunity to purchase award-winning HP consumer products at discounted prices.

The HP Employee Purchase Program (EPP) offers HP consumer products at discounts typically up to 10 percent off starting prices. You can also take advantage of instant rebates, coupons, and HP home and home office sales promotions that combine with your EPP discount for a typical savings of 20 to 30 percent! Look for the EPP tag throughout the store to see your member savings. Use the code EP17047 when registering.

CLICK HERE to learn more.

Microsoft

Through eligible employers, the Microsoft Home Use Program provides the opportunity to score great prices on Office 365.

CLICK HERE to get started.
